definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image

sentences.english: Its founder made modern Chinese printing into a new era of the draftsmanship.
sentences.chinese: 它的創辦，將中國近代印刷帶進了石印的新時代。

sentences.english: In the mountains almost everything had to be mimeographed or stone-block lithographed.
sentences.chinese: 在山區，差不多所有的材料部是油印或石印的。

sentences.english: Lithographic illustrations of novels was very popular.
sentences.chinese: 石印插圖本小說風靡一時。

definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
stele/vertical stone tablet for carved inscriptions
seal (of office)/seal script (a calligraphic style)/the small seal 小篆 and great seal 大篆/writing in seal script
official seal/imperial or royal seal/papal bull
